Summary: Hovering Orange light turns off. Then cabin light comes on
trends: There have been 4 other sightings in Shawnee
There were no other sightings in Shawnee on or around September 22nd 2013
divs: Sighting DetailsI've seen this orange ball almost every night sitting on my front porch. But tonight I knot iced it come from the south. Then it disappeared under the tree line. About an hour later I was talking to my father and I seen it moving about a half a mile away. And it was glowing bright orange. And looked like a street light. I told my dad if call him back to try and get a picture. When I hung up the outer orange light goes off and a cabin light comes on. It flew strait east, toward my house. I had my phone out trying to get a video of this. But my iPhone camera isn't very strong. As it got closer and was about 80% up from me and getting closer I ran inside. Nothing is on the video
